attributes.action: Re-open Railway lines from Wellington to Stafford, w to Crewe & Stoke And to Worcester
attributes.additional_details: Re-open the Railway lines from Wellington to Market Drayton to Crewe to Stoke. Part of the Line to Stafford has already been re-opened for Freight. The Railway Line to Worcester via Ketley, Madeley Ironbridge, Much Wenlock (home of Modern Olympics) to Worcester.
